meanings.definition: Of or relating to the oral or aboral surface of a radially symmetrical animal.
meanings.sent1: The actinal side of the sea star is where its mouth is located.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the actinal region of the jellyfish to understand its feeding habits.
meanings.sent3: The actinal part of the starfish seemed to be smiling as it moved along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: Her actinal approach to problem-solving was like a ray of sunshine in the team.
meanings.sent5: The actinal characteristics of the sea anemone made it stand out among other sea creatures.
